thread.title: Chinese bras to Nigerian malls benefit from foreign aid
thread.title_full: Chinese bras to Nigerian malls benefit from foreign aid

title: Chinese bras to Nigerian malls benefit from foreign aid
text: show ad Firms in Britain face huge rises in their business rates but millions in FOREIGN AID is given to a Chinese bra retailer, Nigerian cinema chain and restaurants in Vietnam Britain has poured more than £100million of the foreign aid budget into shopping malls and retail chains around the world Despite high street shops at home facing a massive rise in business rates Some pubs, shops and nurseries in the UK are facing 300 per cent rises MPs called on Theresa May to divert some of the £12bn foreign budget to provide relief for suffering businesses in the UK
